summary: Follower mod compatible with almost any body mod or skin/hair textures
descriptionHtml:
I NO LONGER SUPPORT THIS MOD I DISCCOVERED A LARGE AMMOUNT OF BUGS AND HAD TO OVERHAUL THE FOLLOWER IT WHICH CAN BE FOUND HERE (coming soon) READ HERE IMPORTANT ---REQUIRES APACHI SKY HAIR (latest update) necessary
1 vanessa can be found in the bannered mare in white run  
2 this is my first mod and i can\\\'t make her follow you normally so you open the console click on vanessa and type      player.setrelationshiprank player 4       (enter) then      setrelationshiprank player 4       (enter) then      addfac 5c84d 4          (enter) then you will be able to tell her to follow you and she will act as a normal follower from this point on 
OK FUN STUFF TO KNOW NOT REALLY IMPORTANT
 vanessa has 100 in one hand heavy armor light armor and sneak as well as every single perk in those skill trees so it is unlikely she will give your position away while sneaking and she is also deadly efficient in combat ( i designed her to be a dual wielder) all of her other stats are 0 to stop her from using bows and other nonsense she has no skills or perks for 
she will conform to any body mods and face or skin textures you have installed
for her to look like she does in my screen shots you would need
1 The sevenbase body form
2 Coverwoman/normalmaps/bellas better females 
3 eyes of beauty
4 Milkdrinker skin textures / barbarian skin textures 
TROUBLESHOOTING if she cannot be found in the bannered mare first wait 12 hours and check again if shes still not there open the console type     player.placeatme 20040000    
 
when i order her to kill someone she instead tries to kill me i have no fix for this (besides to not tell her to kill people)
author: wargodxane
